Class Shop

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shop

  • public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
    The Shop is the central back end class, calling the various other classes and their methods. The class inventory and SupplyList hold the lists for items and suppliers respectively, and are connected here. These classes are called from here and return the strings which are printed in the FrontEnd.
    Since:
    February 16, 2020
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rifat haque

      • listAllItems

        public void listAllItems()
        Calls the inventory to print all items.

      • decreaseItemQuantity

        public java.lang.String decreaseItemQuantity(java.lang.String name)
        Calls manageItem in class inventory and returns the string to be printed on the FrontEnd. if a item is found it returns that the item has been decreased, otherwise it says the item could not be decresed.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the item that should be decreased in quantity
        Returns:
        a string which says whether the items quantity was decreased or not

      • listAllSupplier

        public void listAllSupplier()
        Calls the class supList to print all suppliers.

      • printOrder

        public java.lang.String printOrder()
        Calls inventory to print all current orders. Works when an item is decreased, then the method is called to print an order.
        Returns:
        a String with all the orders or that there are no orders

      • getItemByName

        public java.lang.String getItemByName(java.lang.String name)
        Calls method searchItemByName in inventory to find the item and sends back the item.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the item to be searched for
        Returns:
        a String which holds the item information of the item searched for

      • getItemById

        public java.lang.String getItemById(int id)
        Calls method searchItemByName in inventory to find the item and sends back the item.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item to be searched for
        Returns:
        a String which holds the item information of the item searched for

      • getItemQuantity

        public java.lang.String getItemQuantity(java.lang.String name)
        This method also uses the inventory search method and returns the current quantity of the named item.
        Parameters:
        name - a String of the name of the item to be searched for inside inventory
        Returns:
        a String which says whether the item was found with its current quantity or if it is not within the inventory
